entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM AOT segfault in wasm-opt on linux-musl-x64 when FSharp.Core is referenced #44933
  • .NET9 MAUI sample App build crash on C:\Program Files\dotnet\sdk\9.0.100\Sdks\Microsoft.NET.Sdk\targets\Microsoft.NET.Sdk.FrameworkReferenceResolution.targets(494,7) #44919
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44915

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64][intermittent]Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." When running the command quickly. #41588
    10.0.1xx
  • Deduplicate NuGet sources provided from NuGet.Config and .NET CLI arguments for tool install #43507
    10.0.1xx
  • Warnings about transitive dependency vulnerabilities when using .NET 9 SDK #44929
  • Workload instalation doesn't respect rollback file #27402
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • [CP to release/9.0.2xx] Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Undo 10.0 sdk workarounds and re-enable scenario-tests #44937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for MSbuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44928
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for MSBuildProjectLoader.LoadProjectInfoAsync throwing on unrecognized project language #44927
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [VMR] Enable building Mono Cross AOT verticals #44924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `global::` from generated global usings #44916
    untriaged, Area-ImplicitUsings
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Work around concurrency issue in COM API #44930
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update implicit versions and to GA #44834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Avoid duplicate sources #44853
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Remove the 9.0 template #44780
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Distribute 9.0 stable packs in 10.0 SDK #44918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #44887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable sourcebuild repo leg #44286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP - Add fantomas formatting support #44801
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2584386 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove 6 from the branch codeflow #44829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Apply xunit configuration to all tests for better test failure diagnostics #44907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support publishing of multi-architecture OCI container images #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
